functions.tag: {CustomModelData:1,display:{Name:'{"translate":"ラハット・ハヘレヴ・ハミトゥハペヘット","color":"red","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(VII)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"炎の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"智天使と共に語られる剣","color":"red","italic":false}','{"translate":"炎そのものが剣の形を取っている。","color":"red","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"B","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" エクリプスフレイムⅢ"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"炎",Tier:7},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"黒魔導士",SkillID:546,Name:"エクリプスフレイム",Level:3,Interval:80,Trigger:"近接攻撃する",Count:32},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:1.6,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
